title: Tennis no Ouji-sama: Another Story - Kako to Mirai no Message
title_japanese: テニスの王子様　OVA ANOTHER STORY ～過去と未来のメッセージ
title_synonyms: Tennis no Ouji-sama OVA Another Story: Kako to Mirai no Message
Prince of Tennis: Another Story - Messages From Past and Future
synopsis: A new Prince of Tennis OVA, called Prince of Tennis OVA Another Story ~Kako to Mirai no Message~, was announced at Shueisha's Jump Festa 09 this past weekend. The official website of the show has confirmed it yesterday. According to the latest issue of Weekly Shonen Jump magazine, Another Story will take place in Osaka after the finals. The preview of the new OVA will be available on the third volume of Prince of Tennis: The National Tournament Finals.

Prequel.name: Tennis no Ouji-sama: Zenkoku Taikai-hen - Final

Side story.name: Tennis no Ouji-sama: Another Story - Messages From Past and Future Specials

Sequel.name: Tennis no Ouji-sama: Another Story II - Ano Toki no Bokura

ending_themes: "Iroasenai Ano Sora e (色褪せないあの空へ)" by STONES (eps 1, 3)
"Sakamichi no Hate e (坂道の果てへ)" by Hyotei Eternity (ep 2)
"Owaranai Ai (終わらない愛)" by Rikkai Young Kan (ep 4)
